    • Method Detail

      • get_all_categories

        public static java.lang.String[] get_all_categories()

      • add_request

        public static boolean add_request(int user_id,
                  java.lang.String desc,
                  int status,
                  java.lang.String points,
                  java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String categories)
        given all the data to add a request, does so. if any parts fail, this will return false.
        Parameters:
        user_id - the user's id
        desc - a description string, the core of the request
        status - look in the database for request status. e.g. open, closed, taken
        points - the points are the currency for the request
        title - the short title for the request
        categories - the various categories for this request, provided to us here as a single string. Comes straight from the client, we have to parse it.
        Returns:
        false if an error occured.
